question: I would like to remove the arrogance and pride I have, as well as my habit of using bad language and bad temprement can Mufti please give me some advice.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Consider the following: man is created from an impure speck of semen -
something even his parents felt shy to talk about. He, then carries within
his body a host of impurities. His end will be sand and dust.

Visualize this, and Insha Allah, it will eradicate this feeling of pride.
Whenever you think of uttering abusive words, ponder over the Hadith wherein
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, pointing to his tongue, 'This
will certainly take a number of people to hell.' The bad temperament you
mention, stems from pride. Once the problem of pride is sorted out, this
will, Insha Allah, also be sorted pout.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
